result.eng: Readers and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.

result.eng: They were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
